channel.title: NorthRidge Video Podcast
channel.description: As a church, our mission is simple: Wake the World Up to Jesus. Show them His love. Tell them His Truth. Involve them. But within that is our goal to continually help you grow your relationship with God and your heart for his cause. Wherever you are, we're dedicated to meeting you there.
